title: 06/16/2021 - Best Of The Herd
itunes:title: 06/16/2021 - Best Of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to Kevin Durant’s incredible performance against the Bucks and why it feels like the Nets are setup to win the championship. He shares the latest on Kawhi Leonard’s status for the remainder of the Jazz series and what it means for the rest of the playoff landscape. He also puts some blame on Aaron Rodgers for the drama filled offseason the Packers have dealt with so far. Plus, Nick Wright from FS1 joins the show to talk about Durant’s big night and if the Clippers season is over after Leonard’s latest injury. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
